fourScreen.title: Interactive 3D tool for real estate has become a fast, user-friendly, and immersive solution that took real estate sales to the next level.

fiveScreen.title: Features
fiveScreen.desc: Archimatika works online from any computer. No install needed, everything is available at one click. It’s fast and easy to use, both for clients and sellers. Besides that, the system allows configuring the features to your needs.

card1.title: Filter
card1.desc: Offer the most suitable solution for your<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> customers with the help of numerous filters

card2.title: Floor plans
card2.desc1: Reveal a detailed layout of each<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> unit, containing availability, 3D<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> picture, floor plans, and many more.
card2.desc2: Get contact information from those<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> who are particularly interested<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> in the proposal right here.

card3.title:
Common area
& amenities
card3.desc: Showcase public spaces for tenants to meet and communicate. Pools,<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> bars, gyms, terraces, or any other space that can be easily shared by them.

card4.title: Surroundings
card4.desc: Inform your clients about the region’s outstanding infrastructure by<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> demonstrating amenities situated within easy reach such as parks, malls,<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> banks, restaurants, and health club facilities.

card5.title:
Unit information
& unit plans
card5.desc1: Display the important information<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> about units with ease and style. It is<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> usually displayed in a pop-up with<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> the unit number, characteristics,<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> price, and other useful information.
card5.desc2: The pop-up contains different<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> buttons to open the plan,<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> panoramic view, send the<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> information by email, etc.

card6.title: Interior visit
card6.desc1: Seeing is believing. It’s not easy for<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> users to figure out how their future<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> home will look like just by pictures.
card6.desc2: So, Archimatika is all-ready<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> to provide an immersive experience<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> with virtual interior visits. To help<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> people develop the vision of real<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> estate.

card7.title: Email and customer relationship<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> management
card7.desc: This tool supports sending users information about selected units<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> (plans, documents, images, technical details, or pricing), while saving<br class='small-medium-to-mobile-small'> the contact info to your CRM.

sixScreen.title: Online content management and connectivity
sixScreen.desc1: Besides real-time connectivity with any CRM, ERP, or asset management software, Archimatika comes with an online Content Management System.
sixScreen.desc2: Since projects always evolve through time, online management allows easily changing unit prices, plans, texts, images, videos, or any other content without on your own.
sixScreen.desc3: Moreover, we can connect to any existing API to centralize updates, as an example, any content shared by both the Archimatika tool and your website will be updated all simultaneously.

sevenScreen.title: Cross-platform solution
sevenScreen.desc: 3D interactive real estate visualization tool designed for PC touchscreen, smartphones, tablets, and web with an easy-to-use interface
